text: Pink has announced a series of massive UK and Ireland shows as part of her Beautiful Trauma tour. The singer will perform six shows in 2019, beginning with a gig in Dublin on 18 June before heading to London's Wembley Arena on 29 and 30 June. The shows, which are in support of her last album Beautiful Trauma, take place around Glastonbury weekend, which has caused a flurry of speculation that the pop star may appear at next year's festival. Pink will be supported by singer - songwriter Vance Joy, KidCutUp and Bang Bang Romeo on all of the UK and Ireland dates.
